echo
----
>> init
State:{LastIndex:100 LastTerm:20 ByteSize:0} RaftTruncatedState:{Index:100 Term:20}
>> append (100,103]

>> append (101,102] with overlap

>> append (102,105]

>> truncate at 103

>> truncate all
